At practice Wednesday, Michael Vick loosened up throwing passes to Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan, who is making his first Pro Bowl appearance in his third season and succeeded Michael Vick in Atlanta. Matt is great. The coaching staff is great. We're just having a good time, he said. ''I like what they're doing in the offense and it's been easy. of fun that he is-insists on carrying the communal experience over into his highly praised live shows, an engulfing mix of multimedia, props, and crowd interaction, all anchored by Rich Aucoin 's own presence. I usually call it crowd karaoke. The whole crowd sings things together, and it's a dance party on top of that. The visuals are all in 3D, so you can stand at the back and just watch the movie that's playing on the screen. I cut up all these movies and I write the music to sync up to the movies that show in the background. The shows have certainly helped with the buzz building around Rich Aucoin ; recently, a misinterpreted Facebook update started a rumour that he would be performing on the Late Show with David Letterman . Windows tablets- a ''slew of them''- will be unveiled by Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer at the 2011 Consumer Electronics Show, according to an article today in the New York Times. Citing people familiar with Microsoft's plans, the Times reports that several manufacturers have signed up to build Windows tablets, including Dell and Samsung.
